instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link for Barlow Condensed and JetBrains Mono to index.html immediately.
2. CUSTOMIZE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the 'font-heading' (Barlow Condensed) and 'font-mono' (JetBrains Mono) families.
3. BUILD LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Analysis Results page. Do not just stack cards vertically.
4. HUD INTERFACE: When displaying the 'Photo Detail View', overlay a technical HUD (Heads Up Display) on the image. Use absolute positioning for bounding boxes.
5. PDF REPORT: Ensure the PDF report generation uses a clean, table-based layout that mirrors the 'Performance Pro' aesthetic (black headers, white text).
6. DARK MODE: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. Avoid pure black backgrounds; use slate-950 or similar.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to the Upload Dropzone, Analyze Button, and Export PDF button.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
